property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever you attack, you create a Food token for each player being attacked. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {W}, {T}, Tap X untapped Foods you control: Create X 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts you control are Clues in addition to their other types and have "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card." Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Mastermind Plum attacks, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If an artifact card was exiled this way, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Whenever you cast a spell, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Headliner Scarlett enters the battlefield, creatures target player controls can't block this turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library face down. You may look at and play that card this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Emissary Green attacks, starting with you, each player votes for profit or security. You create a number of Treasure tokens equal to twice the number of profit votes. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control equal to the number of security votes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Other Soldiers you control have vigilance, trample, and haste. {2}{R}{W}: Until end of turn, Soldiers you control gain "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to defending player."

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever equipped creature dies, each opponent loses 1 life. {2}, Sacrifice Lead Pipe: Draw a card. Equip {2}

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: Ballroom enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Billiard Room enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Conservatory enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dining Room enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hall enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kitchen enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Library enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lounge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Secret Passage enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Study enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {4}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain afterlife 1 until end of turn. Draw a card. (When a creature with afterlife 1 dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As far as the Orzhov Syndicate is concerned, it is the height of irresponsibility not to have a plan for your own ghost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, menace Other Insects you control have menace. Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, you may create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token, then put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the greatest mana value among those cards. Do this only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Boros Strike-Captain and at least two other creatures attack, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with three or more creatures, you may play that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep up with me, comrades, or I cannot guarantee you a fair share of the fracas."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Carnage Interpreter enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then investigate four times. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") As long as you have one or fewer cards in hand, Carnage Interpreter gets +2/+2 and has menace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.) Whenever Conclave Evangelist deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Conclave Evangelist.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains myriad until end of turn. (Whenever it attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.) Overload {3}{U}{U}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest. Then you create a tapped Treasure token for each creature your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wealthier than ever thanks to exorbitant interest on wartime loans, the Orzhov only grew hungrier for more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you attack, surveil X, where X is the number of opponents being attacked. At the beginning of each end step, if three or more cards were put into your graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield this turn, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Ecstatic Electromancer enters the battlefield or attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her theories are grounded. Her experiments are not.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Frenzied Gorespawn enters the battlefield, for each opponent, goad target creature that player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.) Whenever one or more creatures attack one of your opponents, those creatures gain menace until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on Furious Spinesplitter for each opponent that was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Gruul believe the best way to protect Ravnica's wilderness is to destroy civilization and all who defend it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you cast a creature spell, put two +1/+1 counters on Herald of Ilharg. If that spell has mana value 5 or greater, Herald of Ilharg deals damage equal to the number of counters on it to each opponent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Incriminating Impetus enters the battlefield, suspect enchanted creature. (It has menace and can‘t block.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only during an opponent's turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Lonis, investigate that many times. Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Memory Vampire deals combat damage to a player, any number of target players each mill that many cards. Then you may collect evidence 9. When you do, you may cast target nonland card from defending player's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Whenever you attack a player, target creature that's attacking that player gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The recruits had a lot to learn. Luckily, she had a lot to teach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Portal Manipulator enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, choose target player and any number of target attacking creatures their opponents control. Those creatures are now attacking that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The next punch you throw hits the back of your own head."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Resonance Technician enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, investigate twice. {T}, Tap X untapped artifacts you control: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control with mana value X. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Vigilance When Scuttling Sentinel enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. Until end of turn, that creature becomes a blue Crab in addition to its other types and gains hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Sludge Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, mill five cards. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hideous, living residue of countless corpses dissolving anonymously in the scummy depths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Stampede Surfer attacks, for each opponent, you create a 2/2 green Boar creature token that‘s tapped and attacking that opponent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sumala Rumblers's power is equal to the number of creatures you control. Myriad (Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile the tokens at end of combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a player attacks you, if that player has another opponent who isn't being attacked, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Attention, brawlers! You are in violation of Senate statute 2309.76-22. Halt your melee before you incur further charges."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Tribune of Rot attacks, mill two cards. For each creature card milled this way, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I bestow upon you a great honor - your flesh alone will nourish a new generation of saprolings."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Undercover Butler attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, it can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dress for the job you want them to think you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Unruly Krasis attacks, you may have the base power and toughness of another target creature you control become X/X until end of turn, where X is Unruly Krasis's power. {3}{G}{U}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Vernal Sovereign enters the battlefield or attacks, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is spring incarnate, its gentle warmth chasing away the last of winter's bite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Planeswalkers conjured replicas of old allies, reminders of the homeworlds that would fall next if Bolas prevailed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead. Angel of Vitality gets +2/+2 as long as you have 25 or more life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Azorius Justiciar enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When its power is threatened, the council speaks with a unified voice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deadly Riposte deals 3 damage to target tapped creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Automatons are fast, precise, and tireless, but they all share one weakness: predictability. Learn their patterns. Strike when they're vulnerable." - Horance, Urzan general

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. If X is 10 or more, also create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky boiled over the citadel, dire and dark. Then the angels brought the dawn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 2 life: Glorifier of Dusk gains flying until end of turn. Pay 2 life: Glorifier of Dusk gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of the enemy is a sacrament. The strength it gives is proof that our cause is just."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.) Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Honor the gods of Theros, and they will return the favor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Tap target creature with mana value 2 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See that no one enters or leaves New Prahv today. And notify me at once of any Planeswalker activity." - Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever enchanted creature attacks, each other creature that's attacking one of your opponents gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly." - Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "‘Invincible' is just a word." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The guildmasters loom large in the political sphere, but in the end, the rulers of Ravnica are its people.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Roc Charger attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rocs' innate fearlessness makes them ideal mounts for emergency response.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No harm can come to me while the Worldsoul shelters me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Seller of Songbirds enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lady Wren is the one merchant in Keyhole Downs who isn't running a scam." - Mirela, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Entrance is free. Donations are required." - Notice outside Vizkopa Bank

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many wings haunt the skies these days. Few of them bear good tidings." - Lavinia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Trusted Pegasus attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Would you give your life to save this world?" Gideon murmured. The pegasus snorted and spread wide its mighty wings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Twilight Panther gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pet that can hunt both flesh and spirit is precious in a place where smiling assassins keep company with ghostly shadows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear that Boros is losing its angels to the Gateless Movement. I'm sure this comes as no surprise to you." - Teysa, to Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My specialty is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Cloudkin Seer enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can see which way the wind is blowing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ivold gasped in surprise. Either a very strange insect had crawled onto one of the lenses or he was seeing geists at last!

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Graft 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.) {1}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Jeering Homunculus enters the battlefield, you may goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mklthd had always hated crowds . . . and they had always hated him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Leapfrog has flying as long as you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most compete for insects at street level. Some dwell near Izzet laboratories and ride the thermal updrafts." - Yolov, Simic bioengineer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome." - Speaker Trifon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be." - Agosto, Azorius imperator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now, little fighter, show me you deserved this second chance."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Roaming Ghostlight enters the battlefield, return up to one target non-Spirit creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some who die senseless deaths return as formless spirits, seeking answers where there are none.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sage's Row Savant enters the battlefield, scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The streets of Ravnica are full of former guild members now using their institutional skills for personal gain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life has no mistakes, only experiments." - Yolov, Simic bioengineer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step. Draw two cards, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Advanced Elemental Manifestations is canceled until all students have thawed." - Prismari dormitory notice

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash You may have Stunt Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No duelist is without equal in Paliano.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunder Drake.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The arrival of the Planar Bridge caused eddies in the aether, creating some entirely new species while transforming others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Watcher in the Mist enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A screech in the night is all it takes for Orzhov debtors to clutch at their coin purses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mill three cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (To mill three cards, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How did we find each other? So there I was, exploring a mound of monster corpses . . ."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic use the claws as scalpels, while the Rakdos use them for tattooing and torture. The Gruul use them to pick their teeth after lunching on the rest of the carcass.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That's a pretty ring! Trade you my knife for it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Feed the rumor mills with delicious treachery. Bad blood between those two is a good deal for us." - Kamiz, Obscura Oculus

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Gorging Vulture enters the battlefield, mill four cards. You gain 1 life for each creature card milled this way. (To mill four cards, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anything a falcon can do, a bat can do in pitch darkness." - Urdnan the Wanderer

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why we don't go out in banewasp weather." - Rannon, Vithian holdout

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) {2}{B}: Masked Blackguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her footsteps are whispers, her passage a last breath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mausoleum Turnkey enters the battlefield, return target creature card of an opponent's choice from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he reaches for his key ring, you should be running for the exit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever enchanted creature attacks, its controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) {3}{R}: Rakdos Trumpeter gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The louder their performance, the quieter we become in comparison. They are the perfect distractions, for only fools ignore the Rakdos." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My favorite meal is angel's flesh, slain in agony and iced with black vinegar." - Aszala of House Dimir

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}: Roofstalker Wight gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No heartbeat to hear, no greed to bribe, no fear of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, Spawn of Mayhem deals 1 damage to each player. Then if you have 10 or less life, put a +1/+1 counter on Spawn of Mayhem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the darkest corners of Ravnica still lie in the shadow of the Church.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them." - Teysa

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Venomous Hierophant enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many have sought snake-twined Pharika's panacea. Do you wish to share their fate?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control dies, Vindictive Vampire deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In theory, the Guildpact keeps guild feuds from spiraling out of control. Personal feuds, however, are not covered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind." - Urgdar, cyclops philosopher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cosmotronic Wave deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control. Creatures your opponents control can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This sort of innovation occurs when you set out to improve an electric tea kettle and misplace a decimal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dagger Caster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep coming. I have knives enough for everyone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Direct Current deals 2 damage to any target. Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Fire Urchin gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rain runoff in the Smelting District is known to spontaneously burst into flame.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battalion - Whenever Firefist Striker and at least two other creatures attack, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flaming fist of Boros holds the promise of both protection and destruction in its grasp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 red Goblin Wizard creature tokens with prowess. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quiet in the library" soon gave way to larger concerns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Gravel-Hide Goblin gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No peace accord will save Ravnica. You don't build on rot. You burn it down and start again." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Havoc Jester deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the Rakdos, screams of delight and screams of terror are one and the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Living Lightning dies, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all storms come from the sky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ornery Goblin blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ornery Goblin deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nobody ever listens to my complaints! Not even when I use the listening stick."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodrush - {1}{R}, Discard Pyrewild Shaman: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Pyrewild Shaman is in your graveyard, you may pay {3}. If you do, return Pyrewild Shaman to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before they can go to their final rest, the wicked must be purified by fire." - Harra the Adjudicator

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Ravnica's wilds expanded, even advocates for nature had to confront fiercer natural threats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.) Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blood is holy to those whose god is War.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control. Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Towering Thunderfist gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing ruins a party like one of those big killjoys bursting through the door and setting all the guests free." - Ruba, Rakdos cultist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Utvara Scalper attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wages war wherever the wind carries him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Wojek Bodyguard can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By all means, take another step toward the captain."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Affectionate Indrik enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The problem isn't the indrik's enthusiasm, it's Ravnica's lack of guardrails.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Battlefront Krushok can't be blocked by more than one creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Krushoks clear debris from fertile fields, fallow fields, and battlefields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tiniest mouse speaks louder to me than all the festival crowds on Tin Street."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For most, war is a calamity. For some, an opportunity. And for the very few, a pleasure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Might doesn't just build empires. It protects them." - Inti, Sun Empire knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Duskshell Crawler enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They often perch on street lamps, causing the poles to buckle under their weight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enraged Ceratok can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no time to calm it down! Run!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If a creature died this turn, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're all food for something in the end." - Cevraya, Golgari shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Giant Adephage deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Giant Adephage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To a creature like that, we must seem like, well, bugs." - Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the sky screams, when the ground groans, the End-Raze will soon begin." - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Undergrowth - When Kraul Harpooner enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature you don't control with flying. Kraul Harpooner gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard, then you may have Kraul Harpooner fight that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}{G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kronch Wrangler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Choose up to one target creature an opponent controls. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forward! Until the horizon is ours!" - Khemses, charioteer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3, must be blocked if able, and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{G}{G}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within each of us, the potential for great power waits to be released." - Zija, Simic mutationist

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}: Steeple Creeper gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the Fin Clade cannot produce a reliable venomous krasis, mobile in both air and water, then the Guardian Project will absorb its resources." - Vannifar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Boar gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The presence of the strong will make you stronger." - Yeva, Nature's Herald

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, Sacrifice Transluminant: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forget yourself. Forget your city. Forget your homes, your families, the debts and obligations that hold you to this world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most elegant solutions are found in nature. You just have to know where to look."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two times the size, four times the smell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you're lucky, the centaurs will give a single warning to leave their territory before driving a spear into you. If you're unlucky, the spear is the warning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yeva's Forcemage enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature can't be stopped. It rips and tears at Ravnica's tallest buildings to claim its place in the sun."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or more - • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying. • Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature At the beginning of each upkeep, tap enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant's real punishment was the fleeting moment when he was allowed to stand before being dragged down to his knees again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Deadbridge Chant enters the battlefield, mill ten cards. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

property.name: Color
Rules
property.value: Tap target creature. Draw a card. // Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({UB} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Color
Rules
Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of their library, loses life equal to that card's mana value, then puts it into their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Battalion - Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Firemane Nevena led the victorious assault on the Barbu Rooftop rebels. Now the Gateless have marked her for death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firespout deals 3 damage to each creature without flying if {R} was spent to cast this spell and 3 damage to each creature with flying if {G} was spent to cast this spell. (Do both if {R}{G} was spent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Footlight Fiend dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This footlight's broken. Get me a stagehand!" - Judith

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as it's your turn, Fresh-Faced Recruit has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold on to your ideals. They'll be tested more than your armor or the edge of your blade." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: {UR}: Frostburn Weird gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many chemisters are oblivious to the innumerable machinations of their guild, instead focusing obsessively on creating the perfect weird.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. {4}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, you gain half X life and draw half X cards. Round down each time. Flying, trample Hydroid Krasis enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Havoc is a small price to pay for data.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even this primitive specimen of my kind is impressive." - Niv-Mizzet

property.name: Color
Rules
Color
Rules
Rules
property.value: Protection from red When Lavinia of the Tenth enters the battlefield, detain each nonland permanent your opponents control with mana value 4 or less. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each other creature you control enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to Master Biomancer's power and as a Mutant in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature is a wonderful engineer but works far too slowly for my tastes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}: Target player gains 1 life. {2}{B}: Each player loses 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the coins in Ravnica can't save his soul now." - Narbulg Nine Fingers

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The reign of the Swarm begins. Let us rise now and dress ourselves in vengeance."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there were such a thing as a soul, I think it would be behind the gallbladder but above the kidneys."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample When Rakdos, the Showstopper enters the battlefield, flip a coin for each creature that isn't a Demon, Devil, or Imp. Destroy each creature whose coin comes up tails.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {6}{GU}{GU}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.) As long as Scuttlegator has a +1/+1 counter on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. {3}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}: Seraph of the Scales gains vigilance until end of turn. {B}: Seraph of the Scales gains deathtouch until end of turn. Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a green Snake with base power and toughness 1/1. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Losing his possessions distressed him, but the lack of limbs was strangely liberating.

property.name: Color
Rules
Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leonos had no second thoughts about the abolishment edict. He'd left skyrunes warning of the eviction, even though it was cloudy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Thief of Sanity deals combat damage to a player, look at the top three cards of that player's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest into their graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other creatures you control get +1/+1. When Trostani Discordant enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink. At the beginning of your end step, each player gains control of all creatures they own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Did you expect me to dodge? How quaint." - Olka, mistmeadow witch

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards of your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Selesnya's soil is sacred, and you're about to meet it with your face."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov vampires look for allies in unlikely places in case their new guildmaster turns on them. The fate of the Obzedat is proof of Kaya's power and her hatred of the living dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Whisper Agent enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has a job to finish, and it's you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law - strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size - a weight of strength and of pride." - Agrus Kos

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sigil holds different meanings depending on its form and presentation. While some wear it as a sign of status, others wear it as a sign of debt.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter the Senate, the seat of justice and the foundation of Ravnican society.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is our duty to protect all those in need. But the other guilds have never shown themselves worthy of that protection." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped. When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield tapped. When Golgari Rot Farm enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and leave the shackles of society behind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped. When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{G}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield tapped. When Izzet Boilerworks enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every laboratory buzzes with new experiments, each a piece of Ral's ambitious project.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield tapped. When Orzhov Basilica enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{B}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie." - Kaya

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield tapped. When Rakdos Carnarium enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{R}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and indulge your darkest fantasies, for you may never pass this way again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter and rejoice! The Conclave stands united, open to one and all.

property.value: Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red. {T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Thriving Grove enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Grove enters the battlefield, choose a color other than green. {T}: Add {G} or one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Far from human eyes, birds flit between vivid blossoms in a hidden paradise.

property.value: Thriving Heath enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Heath enters the battlefield, choose a color other than white. {T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wildflowers here bloom not with the season but with the ebb and flow of magic.

property.value: Thriving Isle enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Isle enters the battlefield, choose a color other than blue. {T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

property.value: Thriving Moor enters the battlefield tapped. As Thriving Moor enters the battlefield, choose a color other than black. {T}: Add {B} or one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beauty appears in strange places for those with eyes to see it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate only during an opponent's turn.
